course.title: Unreal Engine Blueprint Game Developer
course.subtitle: Code Your First Video Game in 100 minutes with Visual Scripting. Created in collaboration with Epic Games.

reviews.body:
I didn't really have a lot of knowledge about blueprints and unreal before I started this course! But I feel that this course and the teacher really takes you through step by step at a good pace. I felt a lot of the time the challenges that were presented to me were things I actually could solve on my own and it felt so good every time I checked and I saw that I had understood it!

So if you want to start to learn the basics of Blueprints in Unreal I can really recommend this course!
It was a great course! Very easy to follow and lots of tips along the way. Would definitely recommend if you're a beginner/refresher for blueprints in Unreal Engine.
Great course with a lot of interesting topics. I got a good starting point, how to start developing with blueprints in the Unreal Engine.

Comprehensive, step by step training with constant challenges to get you to actually understand and absorb the concepts so that you can do more yourself. By the end I was making whole sets of mechanics and features just based on the summary (non-challenge summaries at that) and it felt fantastic to have done it by myself :)

As a beginner, I loved this course a lot. If you have little or no coding background and would like to start developing games in a span of a couple of days then, this course is for you. You may want to subscribe to additional courses for deeper understanding based on where your interests take you!

Absolutely brilliant course, really engaging and easy to follow - even for someone who is completely new to game design, coding, etc. It was a really enjoyable and informative experience and makes me want to keep at it!
It took me a minute to take in Lesson 3 but now that I got it down, I am very satisfied. This course is absolutely outstanding!!

Kurs jest dla każdego kto chce zacząć przygodę z blueprint w UE 4

Każda z lekcji ma różnorodne funkcje i pokazuje wskazówki do stworzenia gry.

I still want to learn how to use BluePrints and how to build games. This was my first course on getting to know Unreal Engine and it was fun and I want to learn even more .... (I have already bought other BP courses as well as courses on mastering Blender and I want to combine the two in the future.)

Probably i will come back and 'restart' the course to practice my skills.

I really enjoyed this course. I would recommend taking this course before diving into their C++ coding course for unreal, mainly because this course does an excellent job of introducing you to how unreal functions as an engine, and you can get a feel for the main concepts. Well pace and easy to understand.
Very good introduction to Blueprints. I'm a complete beginner, so there was a lot to take in, but it's well structured and easy to follow and understand.

Covers all the basics for building your own game in Unreal Engine.

Also goes a lot into code quality and code maintainability & readability, which I did not expect but is a HUGE plus for your expanding projects. Lots of respect for GameDev to also cover these subjects.

Explains the concepts of making a game in Unreal Engine very well.

Good overview listings to follow along the videos & have short challenges for the student to make the knowledge more of his own. Very good teaching practices!

Certainly one of the best courses to follow when wanting to learn Unreal Engine and gain good programming practices as well!

instructor.name: Ben Tristem
instructor.briefIntroduction:
Hi, I'm Ben. I have a degree in computing from Imperial College London, and a physics diploma from the Open University. 

I started working for myself at the age of 15, and never looked back. I explored careers as varied as being a commercial pilot, stunt-man, rock climbing instructor, and more. None of these provided a continued challenge, and stable income in the same way technology does. 

After building and selling a home computer support business, I became an angel investor and business mentor here in Cambridge UK. I fell in love with teaching game development through one of my investments, and I now spend all of my time sharing my passion with people like you. 

I can't wait to help you experience the fulfilment, and financial freedom, that having a deep understanding of technology brings. 

So why not start learning to make games with me and my team now?

See you soon! 

Ben

unitNames: Point Lights, Spot Lights & Sky Lights
